name: tansy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with several small, yellow flowers and thin, delicate leaves, used, especially in the past, to make medicines and to flavour food: Unusual herbs like savory and tansy are easier to grow than to find in a shop. A tansy pudding used to be a traditional dish for Easter.
More examplesFewer examplesTansy was used in cooking, as a tonic, as a soothing lotion, and as an insect repellent.Sachets of tansy leaves make good moth repellents for the wardrobe.Bunches of tansy were traditionally placed at windows to keep out flies.
